title: His Unknown Heir
description: She hides a shocking secretRamon Velaquez, heir to the Velaquez winery, clearly stated his cardinal rule to Lauren Maitland-he can't promise her more than a red&-hot affair. While she heard the words, her heart wasn't listening, and she left with more than the memory of their blissful night togetherâ€¦Two years later, Ramon finds Lauren again. She's independent, strong, and mother to a little boy. One look at the child and Ramon knows he's his. There's only one thing for a marriage of convenience-or the sake of his son and heir!
author: Chantelle Shaw
